ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
If(
    LookUp(
        'SKU Masters',
        'SKU Master' = ThisItem.'Item SKU'.'SKU Master'
    ).'Product group code' = 'Product group code (Choice)'.'2WAY',
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Rules.InvariantScript:
Concatenate(
    "",
    Text(
        Sum(
            colCartItems,
            discountedPrice
        ) + Sum(
            colCartItems,
            taxAmount
        ),
        "[$-hi-IN]##,##,##,###",
        "hi-IN"
    )
)
